review: wouldn't stay connected long enough to even hit the home page, we use a shared wifi but none of the info said it didn't work with a shared wi fi. also got very hot was afraid it would catch my tv on fire. got a hold of customer service and they were going to send me a refirbished one to replace the new one. don't like refurbished product to replace a new one. They emailed me a return label to send it back and then purchase a new one. Why not just send a new one or cross ship.
